stop words subtext: Fill in the field to change agency stop words
agency name subtext: Fill in the field to change agency name
notifications comments subtext: New comments and messages in your events and posts by experts you follow.
notifications events subtext: Information about new events and important updates to the existing ones: changing the time, confirming payment and receiving links to video meetings.
notifications information subtext: Information about interesting events, webinars and courses as well as important platform updates.
